name: lhapdfsets

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
A set of disretised data files of parton density functions , to be used
with the LHAPDF library

dependencies.name: curl
dependencies.description:
cURL is an open source command line tool and library for transferring
data with URL syntax

dependencies.name: lhapdf
dependencies.description:
LHAPDF is a general purpose C++ interpolator, used for evaluating PDFs
from discretised data files.

dependencies.name: tar
dependencies.description:
GNU Tar provides the ability to create tar archives, as well as various
other kinds of manipulation.

dependent_to.name: herwig3
dependent_to.description: Herwig is a multi-purpose particle physics event generator.
